creditline: Gift of the family of Esther Parada:  Adam Wilson, son; Margo Davion and Susan Peters, sisters; and Benjamin Glaser, brother
description: little girl wearing a dirty dress, pulling on the sleeve of a smiling little boy at left; cat seated inside a doorway at right
inscription:
Signature, Inscription and Label

on back, in black ink: [#24 / (SUCRE, BOLIVIA) / SUCRE DOORWAY--2 CHILDREN PLAYING AND CAT / $30.00]
markings: on back: portion of photographer\'s address label
signed: on back, in black ink: [Esther Glaser Parada]
title: Two Children Playing and Cat, Sucre, Bolivia
